DataElement.preferredName: Congenital Platelets Abnormality Other Type Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe other inherited platelet abnormalities.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A group of rare inherited platelet disorders that involve abnormalities of platelet function or platelet production and that usually cause moderate to severe bleeding problems._ Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: Specify the other inherited p
ReferenceDocuments.description: Specify the other inherited platelet abnormalities:

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2679790
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedDiagnosis [major classification] > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedObservation > PerformedDiagnosis.value(ANY=>CD).originalText [detailed classification] WHERE  PerformedDiagnosis.value(ANY=>CD).nullFlavor [detailed classification] = "OTH" AND PerformedDiagnosis.value [major classification] = "Platelet Disorder" AND PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "classify disorder"

DataElement.changeDescription: . Updated def for "Other", no version needed. AK 10/14/13 Added alt name/ASQT for 2400. AK 10/18/13. 7/9/14mn-added aqt w/out 'the'. Added human readable def. System generated def displayed as alt def. No version needed. AK 11/13/14
